profile.name: Christophe Seguinot
profile.title: Senior Frontend Developer
profile.summary: Frontend developer specializing in enterprise-scale React/TypeScript applications with proven ability to design systems serving thousands of daily users. Recently architected IRIS, an AI-powered knowledge platform with 8,500+ users and 90%+ test coverage. Expert in building maintainable architectures using Redux Toolkit, RTK Query, and modern testing frameworks (Vitest, Cypress). Rapidly expanding to fullstack delivery using AI-assisted development with TDD, delivering production Python/Django/Elasticsearch features safely across the stack. Technical mentor who thrives in cross-functional collaboration with product, design, and ML teams.

projects.title: Memory Platform
highlights: Leading development of enterprise project reference repository platform enabling commercial teams to access up-to-date project data and showcase company references for proposals
Led frontend team (2 junior developers + 1 senior) to MVP delivery in July 2025, managing code reviews, architecture decisions, and sprint planning
Extended to fullstack contributions (August 2025+), implementing complex features across React 19/TypeScript frontend and Python/Django/Elasticsearch backend

Architected ReferenceTable system (~2,000 lines): Implemented view-scoped state management to isolate filters/sort between views, smart dual-endpoint switching (Django ORM/Elasticsearch), and 11 specialized cell renderers with TanStack React Table integration

Implemented advanced filter system (13+ filter types): Introduced converter pattern across codebase, GeoCache utility for Mapbox integration, view-based state management, dual testing (Elasticsearch + ORM)
Built custom ProseMirror rich text editor: Replaced third-party library with custom markdown parser, full ProseMirror integration with keymaps, DOMPurify XSS sanitization

Implemented snapshot undo/redo system using Django/pytest with TDD approach, leveraging AI-assisted development for rapid backend learning: New model/manager classes, M2M relationship restoration, 260-line comprehensive test suite
Delivered comprehensive testing infrastructure: 40+ pytest test files using TDD methodology with factory-boy pattern for all models, comprehensive Elasticsearch filter suite
Deployed Docker multi-container orchestration with Docker Compose and GitLab CI/CD multi-stage pipelines (check, build, images-scan, deploy, E2E)
Mentored 3 developers (2 juniors + 1 senior) through code reviews, pair programming, and performance optimization guidance
Adopted business-centric approach with frequent collaboration with product owners, designers, ML engineers, and backend developers

Leveraged AI-assisted development (Claude Code, Cursor) combined with TDD to rapidly deliver production-quality backend features in Python/Django/Elasticsearch after 6 months of learning, maintaining >90% test coverage for safety

projects.title: IRIS Platform
highlights: Architected enterprise AI platform serving 8,500+ users (4,000 DAU) for chat, document analysis, and knowledge management across a global engineering firm

Designed scalable React/TypeScript architecture with layered pattern: API layer (RTK Query, 20+ slices), data layer (Redux Toolkit), source abstraction layer (SharePoint, ERP, Legifrance, custom databases) that can be queried by the user through the chat
Built citation system matching LLM-generated quotes to source documents with automatic PDF navigation to referenced pages
Solved complex LLM citation matching problem where AI-generated quotes don't necessarily match exact text in source documents
Implemented plugin architecture for extensible chat response format support (Chart, Table, Code, Formula, etc.)
Architected 6 domain-specific use cases: contract analysis, reference sheet generation, technical specifications comparison, requirements rating
Extended to fullstack contributions, delivering 2 integrated data sources with Python/Django backend using AI-assisted development and comprehensive testing
Developed Word add-in from scratch using Office.js and React with monorepo architecture (npm workspaces) to bring IRIS capabilities directly into Word for Egis employees
Achieved >90% unit test coverage with Vitest and comprehensive E2E coverage with Cypress organized by use case
Mentored junior developers through code reviews, pair programming, and performance optimization guidance

projects.title: Clickn Collect
highlights: Led frontend development for e-commerce storefront and SaaS digital catalog platform from creation to production
Integrated Figma designs with GraphQL endpoints from Vendure backend
Implemented Stripe payment integration for seamless checkout experience
Built mobile-first solution optimized for SEO and accessibility
Participated in product definition and roadmap planning, contributing SaaS development expertise

projects.title: Rounded
highlights: Audited existing codebase and proposed architectural improvements for crypto accounting platform
Integrated Python REST API for US cryptocurrency accounting solution
Implemented new features and performed maintenance on Next.js application
Mentored junior React developer through complex implementations

projects.title: Blueplan
highlights: Delivered pixel-perfect integration of high-end Figma design for NFT web game promoting "Les Schtroumpfs"
Developed full game in mock mode enabling Web3 developer to easily integrate backend logic
Collaborated internationally with teams in San Francisco and Bali

projects.title: Syment
highlights: Maintained and developed new features for property management SaaS platform for syndics
Implemented automated certified mail sending for meeting minutes
Optimized application performance and reduced load times
Guided junior developers through code reviews and pair programming

projects.title: Obat
highlights: Led migration of invoicing platform from jQuery to React for construction professionals
Followed strict Test-Driven Development approach across all migrations
Integrated all new components into Storybook design system
Served as technical reference for team of 4 frontend developers during migration

projects.title: Moona
highlights: Led frontend development for e-commerce payment platform and merchant dashboard from creation to production
Integrated GraphQL API with AWS Amplify serverless architecture
Implemented complete Stripe payment integration with comprehensive testing
Developed mobile-first with TDD approach, testing on extensive range of mobile devices

projects.title: Lalilo
highlights: Developed and launched p2ia.lalilo.com from scratch in collaboration with French Ministry of Education
Reused existing Lalilo SaaS components for consistent user experience

projects.title: RenovationMan
highlights: Led JAMStack architecture refactoring of corporate website using Gatsby
Defined data model and migrated content to DatoCMS headless CMS
Implemented GraphQL data fetching with mobile-first approach
Created documentation enabling marketing team to manage content independently

projects.title: Websenso
highlights: Developed React PWA with SSR using Drupal 8 Headless backend
Built custom websites with Drupal and PHP customizations

projects.title: Bull, Capgemini
highlights: Backend Java development at Bull and Capgemini
Career transition from plumbing to software development
